snippet.title: Unix/Linux OS: About junk characters, cr lf, junk characters \- AllExperts
snippet.description:
Unix/Linux OS: About junk characters, cr lf, junk characters \- AllExperts
Aug 23, 2004 ... cr lf, junk characters, file txt: In vi , probably not. Try to use tr utility. ... Is there a way to remove such things while in vi editor. Regards, Vivek.
http://en.allexperts.com/q/Unix-Linux-OS-1064/junk-characters.htm
